errors.name: InvalidEntryDeadline
errors.msg: Lockup expiry must exceed entry deadline.

errors.name: AlreadyStaked
errors.msg: Player has already entered the competition.

errors.name: AfterEntryDeadline
errors.msg: Entry deadline has passed.

errors.name: MismatchedYieldSource
errors.msg: Requested yield source does not match vault's source.

errors.name: BeforeLockupExpiry
errors.msg: Lockup has not expired yet.

errors.name: AlreadyMinted
errors.msg: Game tokens already minted to this account.

errors.name: MissingPoolID
errors.msg: Expected this vault to have an asset pool ID; none found.

errors.name: Overflow
errors.msg: Overflow when applying an arithmetic operation.

errors.name: BeforeFinalUpdateExpiry
errors.msg: User's position on the leaderboard can still change.

errors.name: NoReward
errors.msg: No reward for user to claim.

errors.name: AlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: User already claimed this reward.

errors.name: MaxRewardAccounts
errors.msg: Maximum number of reward accounts have been assigned for this competition.

errors.name: CastError
errors.msg: Value does not fit in casted type.

errors.name: VaultNotFull
errors.msg: There are funds outstanding for this vault.

errors.name: Deprecated
errors.msg: This instruction is deprecated.

errors.name: AfterLockupExpiry
errors.msg: Cannot enter a vault after the lockup has expired.

errors.name: PrematureAccountClose
errors.msg: Account cannot be closed yet.

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Amount must be greater than zero.

errors.name: NftOnly
errors.msg: This instruction is only allowed on NFT vaults.

errors.name: NftInvalidInstruction
errors.msg: This instruction is not allowed on NFT vaults.

errors.name: InvalidNft
errors.msg: No valid NFT was submitted.

errors.name: ExceededMaxLen
errors.msg: NFT collections exceeded max len.
